snippet: At the 47th International Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas, scheduled to open on Monday, electronics manufacturers will be showcasing so-called smart TVs that they hope will reinvigorate languishing television sales.
abstract: At the 47th International Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas, scheduled to open on Monday, electronics manufacturers will be showcasing so-called smart TVs that they hope will reinvigorate languishing television sales.

headline.main: Daily Report: 'Smart TVs' in the Spotlight at Consumer Electronics Show
